stack
=====

Command Function
----------------

This command is used to check the usage of each stack in the system.

Syntax
------

stack

Parameter Description
---------------------

None

Usage
-----

None

Example
-------

Enter **stack**.

Output
------

**Figure 1** System stack usage

|image1|

**Table 1** Output description
